thread.title: I am Happy With my Pay Cheques, Says Kareena Kapoor
thread.title_full: I am Happy With my Pay Cheques, Says Kareena Kapoor

title: I am Happy With my Pay Cheques, Says Kareena Kapoor
text:
Photos Bollywood actress Kareena Kapoor displays a creation by Rajesh Pratap Singh during the Lakme Fashion Week in Mumbai, India. | AP Photo | Rafiq Maqbool 
KARACHI: While B’Town celebs are making hype over female actors not being paid well, Kareena Kapoor Khan is happy with her pay cheques. 
Talking about the issue in a recent interview, the 35-year-old actress said that everyone has raised a hue and cry about salaries but she never had an issue, reports the Express Tribune. 
The ‘Bajrangi Bhaijaan’ star further said that she isn’t complaining that she is not paid well in fact she is happy with it. 
Kareena further revealed that the audiences these days are more concerned about good scripts rather than the actor’s payment.
